description:
Private chats on groups
Experimental chat app with end-to-end encryption allowing you to have private chats in groups.
Useful to exchange contact information in bridged/anonymous chat groups.
name: CryptoWhisper

description:
Encrypt text and files
Encrypt and decrypt text and files using a password or a key phrase.
name: CryptoText

description:
Realtime offline-first editor
Fork of webxdc-editor that can be used to work collaboratively on shared documents.
If users are online they will see cursor positions and realtime typing.
name: Realtime Editor

description:
Create & track items jointly
Fork of webxdc checklist that adds visual improvements.
Anyone may create named checklist items and mark them as resolved.
Great for planning a trip, party or shopping.
Lists can be exported and imported.
name: To-do list

description:
Chatters cannot count
Learn to count together with your friends.
name: Chatters cannot count

description:
Event Planner
A collaborative tool for planning events, allowing users to vote on dates and times.
Fun fact: This app was made mostly by AI 🤖.
name: Event Planner

description:
Simple Calculator
Use this simple calculator app without needing to install extra apps on your phone.
You can save the app in the "Saved Messages" chat and create a shortcut in your home
screen to use it as any normal installed app.
name: Calculator

description:
Organize your grocery shopping
Anyone can add, edit and check shopping list items.
Items can be conveniently sorted.
name: Shopping List

description:
Event-Countdown
With Event Countdown you count down the days until an important event.
Track up to 6 appointments. Share your enthusiasm with all group members
with just one click or simply make them jealous 😜
name: Event Countdown

description:
Appointment planning
With this tool you can make an appointment query with just a few clicks.
This will help you find the most suitable date for your project.
A simple rating makes it easy for you to select an appointment.
name: I got time

description:
Sticky Notes
Use this collaborative memo in groups, to keep all relevant data in a central
place without much scrolling. Or use it in "saved messages" to have your memos
available all over your devices.
name: Shared Memo

description:
Mobile-friendly calendar app
Manage events collaboratively with other chat members.
You can import/export events or invites
name: Calendar

description:
Create & track items jointly
Anyone may create named checklist items and mark them as resolved.
Great for planning a trip, party or shopping.
Lists can be exported and imported.
name: Checklist

description:
Clock sync
Clock synchronization using realtime channels.
name: Clock sync

description:
Cork board app (Demo)
This is a working example app to create per-participant
lists of items which can be updated and deleted from
the respective creator
name: Corkboard

description:
WYSIWYG editor
An editor that can be used to work collaboratively on shared documents.
The editor offers headlines, lists, block quotes, bold, italics and more.
Texts can be exported and send as .txt files.
name: Editor

description:
Pixel graphics editor
Collaborative editor for 1-bit pixel graphics.
name: Pixel

description:
Simple poll app
One question, up to 5 predefined answers for people to vote on.
Note that votes are not secret, some chat member could inspect the emails and figure out your vote
name: Poll

description:
Table tennis
Play realtime classic "pong" game with one other player.
name: Pong

description:
Webxdc Realtime Check
Demonstrate and debug the realtime-channels feature.
🏓 Shows ping time of each connection between online peers in a graph view
name: Realtime Check

description:
Webxdc test tool
Developer tool. Run this tool to understand which HTML/JS features are available
for developing webxdc apps
name: Test Webxdc

description:
Tic Tac Toe tournament
Play the classic Tic Tac Toe game against other players and also watch their matches
name: Tic Tac Toe

description:
Time tracker
Track and analyze your project-/work-times easily across multiple devices, become productive 🎯
name: TimeTracking

description:
ZigZag-like arcade game
AmazingTrack is a single player ZigZag-like endless arcade game.
Tap the screen to change the movement direction and try to stay on the track
as long as you can.
name: AmazingTrack

description:
Brick-breaker game
A brick-breaker game inspired on the classic Arkanoid game
name: Arkanoid

description:
Play the wave!
Ride the waveform of your music library while avoiding waves.
Play the provided song or upload your own.
name: Audio Dash

description:
Infinite climber game
Help the egg get back up the tree.
To charge up, tap the screen or hold any key, then release to jump
name: Get Back Up

description:
Reverse-reading game
Challenge your brain in this reverse-reading game!
Your objective is to reach the highest score possible, by reading the reverse-texts
and deciphering them, before the time is up.
Answering a question correctly gives you some extra time. On the other hand, wrong answers
penalize you reducing your remaining time.
Compete with friends in group chats with the in-game scoreboard!
name: Back Read

description:
Match 3 or more gems
Inspired by the classic Bejeweled game.
You can compete with other chat members for the top of the scoreboard!
name: Dejeweled

description:
Connect 4 board game
A clone of the classic Connect Four board game.
A two players board game, the game can be observed by all chat members
name: Connect4

description:
Logic puzzle game
Use your deck of tiles to build a path covering all the lands spreading the good word
while also pillaging some rewards as additions to your deck or sometimes even blessing
you with some powerful abilities
name: Casual Crusade

description:
Classic chess game
Classic chess board game for two players and many observers
name: Chess

description:
Color Lines clone
Clone of the Color Lines (a.k.a. WinLines or WinLinez) game.
You can compete with other chat members for the top of the scoreboard!
name: Color Lines

description:
Color bouncing ball
Make the bouncing ball land in the platforms of the same color
name: Coloron

description:
Pirates cannon fighting game
You're finally fed up with your fleet and their incompetence. Take down all of them and claim your spot at the top. Along the way, you'll discover precious cargo dice that represent your ship's vitality and firepower. You may also encounter friendly merchants, carpenters, and potential crew members.
Be careful not to let your cargo's total value reach the dreaded number: 13, as even rolling that in combat can have unfavorable consequences
name: Coup Ahoo

description:
Flappy Bird clone
Help a little bird to fly avoiding the pipes
name: CrappyBird

description:
Dinosaur arcade game
A pixelated dinosaur dodges cacti and pterodactyls as it runs across a desolate landscape.
Touch the screen or press space to jump over obstacles.
Compete with others for the top of the scoreboard!
name: Dino

description:
Path of the Necromancer
"Forgotten Depths: Path of the Necromancer" is a simplified roguelite,
deck building game where you will craft cards, and customized your deck
to take on the undead and their masters.
If you are in a mobile device, switch to landscape mode to play the game.
This game is a port to WebXDC of the original Forgotten Depths game by
David Brad, licensed under CC-BY-NC-SA-4.0
name: Forgotten Depths

description:
Spider Solitaire clone
Spider Solitaire clone, a captivating and addictive card game that brings the classic
Spider Solitaire experience to your fingertips.
name: fSpider

description:
Idle game
Gibbonacci is an idle/incremental game about you getting a bunch of monkeys to check numbers
for you to find all that belong to Fibonacci sequence. Why? Only you know the answer to that...
The original game was created by Martin Tale: https://github.com/MartinTale/gibbonacci
name: Gibbonacci

description:
Simple rogue-like game
A simple random room generated rogue-like game where you combine different weapons
with unique attack patterns against enemies.
Prove yourself worthy of being called a knight and see how far you can go!
name: Knight Arena

description:
Real-time conversations
With this app you can have real-time ephemeral threads/discussions inside your
chats, ideal for off-topic discussions without disturbing other members of the group.
See who is online, "typing..." indicators and real-time message delivery,
ideal for fast-paced IRC/Slack-like conversations.
Tips: type /nick command in the input field to change nick,
/topic to change the thread topic
name: Live Chat

description:
Single-player matching game
Enjoy several board types, random game generation, hints, undo movements, track your best times
and more with this classic Mahjong Solitaire game
name: Mahjong

description:
Share your mood
Just send the app once in a private chat or group and then you can use it every time to share
your mood. Let your friends know how do you feel ✨
name: Mood

description:
Musa's Quest
Musa's Quest: A Gift From Faraway. A medieval adventure about the search for an exotic gift.
Works on desktop and mobile, too. Just keep the finger on the screen to explore a scene.
name: Musa's Quest

description:
Tower defense game
You are the Necrotic Commander! An ancient master of death and decay,
with the power to reanimate the dead to do your bidding.
Despite your warnings, the local peasantry seek to dethrone you. Using your dark arts,
destroy their pitiful uprising, and send them to their graves!
name: Necrotic Commander

description:
Logic puzzle game
Kill monsters and absorb their power to become more and more powerful!
But beware, you'll soon discover fire, water or plant monsters, and your attacks will have
to be a little more tactical...
name: Number Knight

description:
Othello board game
A clone of the classic Othello/Reversi board game for two players and many observers.
Can be played in real-time
name: Othello

description:
Collaborative pixel-art editor
Similar to the existing Pixel app but every user will draw using their own color
name: Color Pixel

description:
Rick-roll disguised as a game
Just a small prank app to rick-roll your friends, if you don't know what that is, search for "Rickrolling" in Wikipedia
name: Pixel Beat

description:
A monopoly-like card game
Use cards to build power plants strategically and manage power, resources, and pollution wisely.
Can you navigate the crisis and lead the city to survival?
name: Power Crisis

description:
Color Picker Game
Test your brain abilities to think fast and select the correct color
and compete with others for the top of the scoreboard
name: Rainbow

description:
Cast spells by drawing runes
Runekeeper is a turn-based strategy game where you play as a mage defending your lil' tower.
Draw (mouse or touch) symbols seen along the grid to command the Runestone to move.
Use the left half of screen to move up and down.
Use the right half of screen to move left and right.
Passing through a power-up orb will cast a spell when landing.
The power-up color dictates spell type.
The power-up shape dictates the attack pattern.
Defeat as many enemies as possible. Good luck!
name: Runekeeper

description:
Hectic space shooter game
Small hectic space shooter with retro graphics. Touch/Click and drag to move your ship
name: SECTOR 13

description:
Snake clone
Help the snake eat and grow, but be careful not to bite yourself!
name: Snake

description:
Incremental idle game
Incremental idle game with progress even when the game is closed!
Follow the story of a necromancer who has just lost the great war and is ready to rebuild his
armies and fight again. In the process, he finds his conscience and is changing his life
to become a righteous necromancer.
You will build your willing dead army to attack ever-stronger waves of enemies!
Wisely choose skills and attributes to aid your progress to get all trophies
name: Spirit Dungeons

description:
One finger platform game
A sword used to suppress the evil force was stolen, releasing a lot of demons. Find the theft and beat the demons!
Drag to aim and release to jump and slash through enemies
name: Stolen Sword

description:
Classic Sudoku puzzle
Solve countless number of Sudoku puzzles and compete
with other chat members for the top of the scoreboard
name: Sudoku

description:
Help Kitty to find Bunny
Journey through dark forests and snowy meadows,
pass through a great waterfall to finally reach the steppes and confront the Lion King!
Clear the game to unlock Super Bunny and then hop with him at increased difficulty
name: Super Bunny

description:
Logic puzzle game
This is a game about building a castle. Magnificent and eternal,
the fortress of the mind will rise — and it begins with a single block.
The original game was written by Mark Vasilkov for js13kGames in 2023
name: Super Castle

description:
Logic puzzle game
Takuzu is a little logic game.
The game concept is also known as Binairo.
name: Takuzu

description:
Strategy fighting game
Inspired by 2048!
The King has sent his forces to hunt you down. As one of the last Knights Templar, it's a battle for survival!
Move across the battlefield, take down enemies, and gather powerful items. But beware - if your total weight reaches 13, every step will cause damage
name: Templar's Final Stand

description:
Fast paced survival game
2133 AD: Artificial Intelligence finally took your job,
worried about not being able to pay rent for your sleep capsule,
you decided to get your hands dirty as a cleaner in a terraforming company,
clearing planets from hostile live forms for a low wage.
How to play: Attacking is automatic, WASD/arrows/touch & drag to move, click/touch/space to use menus & select items
name: Terraformers

description:
Tetris clone
Clone of the classic Tetris game.
Fill horizontal lines to make them disappear and increase your score.
You can compete with other chat members for the top of the scoreboard!
name: Tetris

description:
Create text cards
Create and share stylish text cards, send congratulations in a stunning way, make your message
standout in a noisy group, or any other situation where a boring plain text message is not enough
name: Text Cards

description:
A Rubik's Cube Game
Rubik's Cube classic game. Swipe and drag to interact with the cube
name: The Cube

description:
Little farm simulation game
Connect the yurts to the farms!
Tap and drag to place paths and re-orient your yurts.
Playing in landscape mode is highly recommended on mobile.
name: Tiny Yurts

description:
One finger concentrated fun
Help Unlucky, the ninja cat, to climb as high as possible.
Jump by tapping the phone screen or use the space-bar on desktop.
Compete with others for the top of the scoreboard!
name: Triska Reloaded

description:
Whack-A-Mole clone
Action game, click on the ninja to get points
name: Whack-A-Ninja

description:
A daily word puzzle
Humans used to fight monsters, but it turned out befriending them is way more practical.
To befriend a monster you must guess its favorite word (or perhaps the only human word they know)
name: Wonster

description:
File sharer
Experimental app that automatically splits files in parts and joins the parts when they are received.
It can be useful when you need to send big files or when there is a maximum file size limit.
name: Sharer

description:
Pac-Man in 1D
Eat all the dots and beware of the ghosts, you got it.
Compete with other players for the only highscore place - it is 1D also there!
name: Pac-1D

description:
Join numbers to a 2048 tile
The classic 2048 puzzle game.
Move tiles with the same number together and get a 2048 tile to win.
High scores are shared with the chat members

Simple drawing board
A little drawing board, create draws and share them with friends,
🎨 🖌️ unlock your creativity!
name: Draw

description:
Stack your way up
Try to place the blocks on top of each other as precisely as possible to build the highest tower!
name: StackUp!

description:
Tetris with a twist
Fast paced puzzle game inspired by Tetris
name: Hextris

description:
Lovely puzzle game
Join the PACKABUNCHAS, a group of space rangers specialized in packing
and rescuing creatures around the galaxy!
Solve tons of Ubongo- or Pentomino-like puzzles, in five different game modes.
You do not compete with other chat members but work together with them 🚀
name: Packabunchas

description:
Tower building game
A little tower building game, you can compete with friends 💒🏢🏬🏦🏯🏰
name: Tower Builder

description:
Mastodon Archive Reader Lite
With this tool you can explore the contents of a Mastodon
archive file: account data, posts, attachments, etc.
Imported data stay on the device and is not shared among group members.
name: MARL
